title: Vortex solutions of parity and time reversal invariant Maxwell-Dirac-Chern-Simons gauge theory
abstract: We construct parity and time reversal invariant Maxwell-Chern-Simons gauge theory coupled to fermions with adding the parity partner to the matter and the gauge fields, which can give nontopological vortex solutions depending on the sign of the Chern-Simons coupling constant.
